name: burger clicker (gamerkid777)
description: How fast can you become a burgerilionaire? By clicking, upgrading, and by hiring, you can soon find out... For the most-part, the game is mostly self-explanatory The far left button is the store, where you can purchase upgrades. The left middle button is your owned skins (which you obtain by purchasing a skin pack), click on the different burgers to switch your burger's skin The right middle button is statistics, where you can see things like how many burgers you are making, and how long you've played* *The amount you played is counted in seconds The right button is options, where you can turn on and off music, fancy graphics*, and where you can reset your progress *Fancy graphics are things such as the clouds, and animation when the items are clicked
